short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 3 clicks to generate direct WhatsApp message link on computer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send Direct Messages in WhatsApp without Adding Contacts!

This only 6 kb Direct WA Message Sender is a simple yet powerful Google Chrome extension that lets you send WhatsApp messages directly, without needing to save the recipient’s number in your phone contacts.

With one click, you’ll be taken straight to WhatsApp Web to start a conversation—no more cluttering your contact list with unnecessary numbers!

Key Features:

- Send WhatsApp messages without saving contacts.
- Generate direct links to WhatsApp Web with just a few clicks.
- Easily send messages to yourself for reminders and quick notes.

Direct WA Message Sender simplifies the process of sending WhatsApp messages by generating direct message links in just a few clicks.

✅ Simply paste any phone number into the extension bar.
✅ Extension will instantly create a clickable WhatsApp link.
✅ Once clicked, the link will open a chat window in WhatsApp Web.

Ideal for users who frequently need to message new contacts quickly and efficiently!

Whether you're messaging new clients, following up with business contacts, or sending reminders to yourself, this extension streamlines the process. It also supports sending messages to yourself, which is perfect for saving important links, notes, or reminders for later.

Privacy-first: The extension does not store or access your phone numbers or messages.

If you ever want to disable the extension, you can do so by navigating to the Chrome menu, selecting "Extensions," and deactivating "Direct WA Message Sender.

Disclaimer: This extension is not affiliated with, associated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by WhatsApp or its parent company. WhatsApp is a registered trademark of WhatsApp LLC.
